original_title: La Bressola. 40 anys d'immersió a la Catalunya Nord
overview: Xavier G. Ubiergo's work talks about the history of the Catalan school model in Northern Catalonia, a symbol of the recovery of the Catalan language, which has almost disappeared in the area, but also of a model where boys and girls from different ages share the classroom and work is done through projects and cooperatively.
title: La Bressola. 40 anys d'immersió a la Catalunya Nord
